text: Everything explained in great detail. I recommend.
At every visit, it's clear that Mr. Jan knows his job, is engaged, and explains the next steps of rehabilitation with attention to detail, all while maintaining a friendly atmosphere.

I came in with chronic neck pain that had been with me for years. After just two visits, I feel significant relief. Mr. Jan gave me a lot of attention and thoroughly explained what was happening with my body and how the treatment would proceed. Full engagement and professionalism. I wholeheartedly recommend.

I am very satisfied with the visit. Mr. Jan approached my case with exceptional professionalism, great engagement, and empathy. He conducted a thorough interview, explained the causes of the ailments in detail, and proposed effective therapy. The entire visit took place in a very pleasant and comfortable atmosphere. I wholeheartedly recommend to anyone looking for a reliable, competent, and kind specialist!
I recommend, the approach and explanation of the problem are at a high level.

Very clear explanation of the injury and the work on the injury. Great calm and empathy that help you relax. A very pleasant, concrete visit ending with instructions for exercises to do at home. I recommend.
Full professionalism, accurate diagnosis, but also a nice conversation. The shoulder recovered - vacation saved.
Mr. Jan helped me with my problematic knee with full engagement and understanding. He listened to me and found answers to all my doubts. I recommend.
Very professional approach to the patient. Detailed explanation of the cause of the problem, exercise recommendations, and most importantly, improvement after the first visit! I warmly recommend
Full professionalism. I highly recommend. The visit took place in a pleasant atmosphere with a detailed explanation of the principles and methods of rehabilitation.
Mr. Jan is an absolute gem of physiotherapy. He is as effective as Gandalf and as all-knowing as Dumbledore. A great specialist, attentive and thorough.
Full professionalism, very good rapport, all problems were thoroughly discussed. You can see vast knowledge and feel positive energy :D
Full professionalism, matter-of-factness, and kindness. I highly recommend Mr. Jan Kowalski.
Spectacular effects and a pleasant atmosphere during the visit.
Very professional, nice, clear explanations :)

Jan is an excellent health care professional! He is very knowledgeable in his field, and has an extremely empathetic and personable style. I have enjoyed my appointments with Jan, and I highly recommend him if you have suffered any kind of injury that requires healing and rehabilitation.
I recommend Mr. Jan! Knowledge, professionalism, and patient approach - every physiotherapist could learn from him! :)
